summary.para: Called when a video sample is returned to the allocator.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: To get a video sample from the allocator, call the method. When the sample is released and then returned to the pool of available samples, the allocator invokes the NotifyRelease method.

summary.para: Called when allocator samples are released for pruning by the allocator, or when the allocator is removed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
